Package com.example.as1

package com.example.as1
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.as1.api
     
    com.example.as1.model
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CommentAdapter
    CommentAdapter manages and displays a list of comments in the RecyclerView of DetailsActivity.
    CommentAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder class representing individual comment items in the RecyclerView
    DetailsActivity
    DetailsActivity displays details of a recipe, allows users to add live comments and ratings through an established WebSocket connection.
    DiscoverActivity
    DiscoverActivity serves allows users to discover and search for new recipes.
    FavoritesActivity
    FavoritesActivity displays a list of the user's favorite recipes.
    LoginActivity
    LoginActivity provides a user interface for users to log in with their email and password.
    MainActivity
    Initializes the MainActivity when it's created.
    MyPantryActivity
    This class represents the activity for managing pantry ingredients.
    PickRecipeActivity
    This class represents the activity for picking a recipe from the available recipes.
    RecipeActivity
    This class represents the activity for managing recipes.
    SignUpActivity
    SignUpActivity provides a UI for users to register for KitchenMingle.
    WebSocketManager
    Singleton WebSocketManager instance used for managing WebSocket connections in the Android application.
